+/null/PROP;cardtext;false,0,100,false;; mark;cardname\ mark;countthis\\ mark;Layer\\\ mark;Side\\\\ mark;OPS\\\\\ prototype;Card Discarded\\\\\\ prototype;Card\\\\\\\ piece;;;3.png;3 - Forward to Richmond/Union may activate any Union army within 4 spaces of Richmond, VA.
